H0.text: The mass of the 350 pieces is greater than the mass of the whole Statue of Liberty.

H1.text: The mass of the 350 pieces that were shipped from France and reassembled in New York is the same as the mass of the whole Statue of Liberty.

H2.text: The mass of the Statue of Liberty is greater than the mass of the 350 pieces into which it was taken apart for shipping to New York, as the assembled statue weighs more.

H3.text: The mass of the Statue of Liberty is not related to the mass of the 350 pieces that were disassembled in France for shipping and reassembled in New York.
